original_title: Juventud, desengaños y anhelos de Hernán Cortés Delgado
overview: Director Jaime Humberto Hermosillo's filmed memoir about his late-teen years in an unglamorous smaller town. Going to the movies a lot, discovering his artistic vocation, stuff like that.
title: Youth, Disillusions and Yearnings of Hernán Cortés Delgado
